roleset.name: to rub, clean, or remove with or as if with a brush

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Men are still combing the beach with shovels and hand brushes , searching for that unusual glint .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the men wielding shovels and brushes -- the ignominiously named `` bedrock sweepers '' who toil in the wake of the excavators

example.name: autogen1
example.text: He 's had other brushes with the law .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: my only previous brush with natural disaster
